name: write-assist-ai
description: This extension assists you in rewriting texts in your markdown files using the power of AI

writeAssistAi.maxTokens.description: Set the maximum number of tokens to use for each API call

writeAssistAi.temperature.description: Set the temperature parameter (0-2) for the API calls

writeAssistAi.openAi.customModel.markdownDescription:
The custom OpenAI model to use (used only when '#writeAssistAi.openAi.model#' is set to `custom`).

If no value is provided then the default configured model will be used instead.

writeAssistAi.systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful assistant. Your job is to perform the tasks related to rewriting text inputs given by the user. If the input text contains any special syntax then strictly follow that syntax, e.g. for markdown return markdown, for latex return latex etc. Do not return markdown for latex, and vice versa.
writeAssistAi.systemPrompt.markdownDescription:
Set the system prompt to use for the API calls.

The prompt specific to the action performed by the user will follow this system prompt.

title.description: The command title. Shows up in the editor tooltip menu

prompt.description: The prompt to use for this command when interacting with an LLM

default.title: Rephrase the selected text
default.prompt: Rephrase the given text and make the sentences more clear and readable.

default.title: Suggest headlines for selection
default.description: Suggests some appropriate headlines for the selected text
default.prompt: Suggest 2-3 short headlines based on the given text.

default.title: Summarize the selected text
default.description: Writes a summary for the selected text
default.prompt: Write a short summary for the given text.

default.title: Expand the selected text
default.description: Builds upon the selected text and makes it verbose
default.prompt: Continue building on the given text, make it better and verbose.

default.title: Shorten the selected text
default.description: Based on the selected text tries to make it concise
default.prompt: Try to make the given text concise while keeping its essence.

writeAssistAi.quickFixes.markdownDescription:
The commands that will show up in the quick fix section of the editor tooltip when you select some text.

**Example:**
```json
[
  {
    "title": "<command name/short title>",
    "description": "<command description>",
    "prompt": "<LLM prompt for the given command>"
  }
]
```
